import crashmenulogo6 from "../assets/crashmenulogo6.webp"; import betswizicon from "../assets/cricketmenuicon.png"; import newicon from "../assets/new_icon.png"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import ProbesKorun from "./Probeskorunmodal/ProbesKorun"; import BDTModal from "./BDTModal/BDTModal"; const Header = () => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const [isOpenModal, setIsOpenModal] = useState(false); const [isOpenLanguage, setIsOpenLanguage] = useState(false); const menuRef = useRef(null); const toggleOpenLanguage = () => { setIsOpenLanguage(true); }; const toggleCloseLanguage = () => { setIsOpenLanguage(false); }; // Modal বন্ধ করার ফাংশন const handleClose = () => { setIsOpenModal(false); }; const location = useLocation(); useEffect(() => { const handleClickOutside = (event) => { if (menuRef.current && !menuRef.current.contains(event.target)) { setIsOpen(false); } }; document.addEventListener("mousedown", handleClickOutside); return () => document.removeEventListener("mousedown", handleClickOutside); }, []); return (
